main event: A blue object giving off a white glare of light, similar to a star but larger, was observed in Chihuahua, Mexico. The object took off instantly and flew upward like a shooting star.
interesting points: The object was first observed approaching the stars and did some erratic maneuvers before disappearing.
The report indicates that the witness was considered to have a psychological problem, and the case was evaluated as an unreliable report.
The Director of Scientific Investigations requested additional information about the case, as similar reports had been coming to the attention of the command.
The report includes a letter from the Director of Scientific Investigations requesting more information about the case, as it appeared to be materially credible.
The report was part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force project to investigate unidentified flying objects.
sighted object: A blue object giving off a white glare of light, similar to a star but larger
